title: 131 - The Japanese Candy Was A Bad Idea
description: On today's show, the boys welcome back Zito and Mitt from vacation and Mitt explains himself for why his room in The Pub looks like a barnyard, plus the gives dive into a couple of the shows they've been watching, they try some Japanese candy from a listener overseas (to disastrous effects), and they cover all the different current events around the world that are making waves throughout the internet. We're doing a giveaway now that we've surpassed 20,000 subscribers on Youtube, so if you haven't subscribed already, make sure to do so. Also send your submissions for The Pod FOD into Twitter and Instagram @ThePodPMI. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
